casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Tony Eugene HOWELL. No. 436P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Tony Eugene Howell, Spruce Pine, for Howell, Tony Eugene. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. *608Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of December 2015 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
